parameter.name: cnBooksale-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: cnBooksale Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=(localdb)\v11.0;Initial Catalog=booksale_db;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=booksale_sa;Password=booksale

parameter.name: cnBooksaleProd-Web.config Connection String
parameter.description: cnBooksaleProd Connection String used in web.config by the application to access the database.
parameter.defaultValue: Data Source=den1.mssql7.gear.host;Initial Catalog=booksale;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=booksale;Password=books@le
